channel.title: Project Purple in Development
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/1jwvug.png[/img]
[size=10pt][color=red]Project Purple In Development
Project Purple Features:
Some Features of Rune Blitz:
Loyalty Titles.. Yes its a 317 aswell :D Zombie Minigame Zombie Minigame Points (Exchange them for rewards!) Lottery System Voting System! Nice Pk Point System Torva, Primal, Chaotics, Ect.... All Minigames Working All Skills Working Red Donator Cape, Which gives X3 Xp in all skills! Green Donator Cape, Which gives X2 Xp in all skills! Abyssal Vine Whip, with a special attack!! :) Korasi with 100% Spec! New Dclaws Run Emote! Dicing for Donator+ Donator Points added for donor shops!
Credits: [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2j3nuaf.gif[/img] Kush [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2j3nuaf.gif[/img] Pk 0r Pure [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2j3nuaf.gif[/img] Mark [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2j3nuaf.gif[/img] Youtube [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2j3nuaf.gif[/img] Google [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2j3nuaf.gif[/img] Fellow Moparian's
Development Team [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2j3nuaf.gif[/img] Kush - Owner & Coder [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2j3nuaf.gif[/img] Mark - Owner & Hoster [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2j3nuaf.gif[/img] pk 0r Pure - Co-Owner & Helper/Tester
i Also need someone to help me with portforwarding aswell, if you could help me over teamviewer it would be Highly Appreciated!
> > Note: Pictures will be added Soon!! < <
